sql-statements.statement: select entry_id, code, name from offering_catalog_entry where catalog_id = :1 and parent_entry_id = :2 and entry_type = 100 and status = 1 order by entry_id
select count(*) entry_count from offering_catalog_entry where catalog_id = :1 and parent_entry_id = :2 and entry_type = 100 and status = 1
select entry_id, name from offering_catalog_entry where catalog_id = :1 and parent_entry_id is null and entry_type = 0 and status = 1 and not name = 'main' order by entry_id
select line1, line2, city, state, zip, country from org_address where parent_id = :1 and address_name = 'Mailing'
select value_text from org_attribute where parent_id = :1 and item_name = 'Primary' and value_type = 10
select org_id, name_primary, tax_id from org where org_internal_id = :1
select line1, line2, city, state, zip, country from person_address where parent_id = :1 and address_name = 'Home'
select value_text phone from person_attribute where parent_id = :1 and item_name = 'Home' and value_type = 10
select name_last, name_middle, name_first, person_id, to_char(date_of_birth, 'DD-MON-YYYY') dob, gender, marital_status, ssn, simple_name from person where person_id = :1

select e.superbill_id, ea.value_text as patient, ea.value_textb as physician, facility_id, to_char(e.start_time - :2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as start_date, to_char(e.start_time - :2, 'HH24:MI') as start_time, e.subject from event e, event_attribute ea where e.event_id = :1 and e.event_id = ea.parent_id and owner_id = :3 and e.superbill_id is not null union select apt.superbill_id, ea.value_text as patient, ea.value_textb as physician, facility_id, to_char(e.start_time - :2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as start_date, to_char(e.start_time - :2, 'HH24:MI') as start_time, e.subject from event e, event_attribute ea, appt_type apt where e.event_id = :1 and e.event_id = ea.parent_id and owner_id = :3 and e.superbill_id is null and e.appt_type = apt.appt_type_id and apt.superbill_id is not null

select e.superbill_id, ea.value_text as patient, ea.value_textb as physician, facility_id, to_char(e.start_time - :3, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as start_date, to_char(e.start_time - :3, 'HH24:MI') as start_time, e.subject from event e, event_attribute ea where e.event_id = ea.parent_id and owner_id = :4 and e.superbill_id is not null and e.start_time >= to_date(:1, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :3 and e.start_time < to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + 1 + :3 union select apt.superbill_id, ea.value_text as patient, ea.value_textb as physician, facility_id, to_char(e.start_time - :3, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as start_date, to_char(e.start_time - :3, 'HH24:MI') as start_time, e.subject from event e, event_attribute ea, appt_type apt where e.event_id = ea.parent_id and owner_id = :4 and e.superbill_id is null and e.appt_type = apt.appt_type_id and apt.superbill_id is not null and e.start_time >= to_date(:1, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :3 and e.start_time < to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + 1 + :3

select e.superbill_id, ea.value_text as patient, ea.value_textb as physician, facility_id, to_char(e.start_time - :3, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as start_date, to_char(e.start_time - :3, 'HH24:MI') as start_time, e.subject from event e, event_attribute ea where e.event_id = ea.parent_id and owner_id = :4 and e.superbill_id is not null and e.start_time >= to_date(:1, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :3 and e.start_time < to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + 1 + :3 and ea.value_textb = :5 union select apt.superbill_id, ea.value_text as patient, ea.value_textb as physician, facility_id, to_char(e.start_time - :3, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as start_date, to_char(e.start_time - :3, 'HH24:MI') as start_time, e.subject from event e, event_attribute ea, appt_type apt where e.event_id = ea.parent_id and owner_id = :4 and e.superbill_id is null and e.appt_type = apt.appt_type_id and apt.superbill_id is not null and e.start_time >= to_date(:1, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + :3 and e.start_time < to_date(:2, 'MM/DD/YYYY') + 1 + :3 and ea.value_textb = :5
